title: Santa Clara Marriott Offers Special Summer Weekend Rates For Last-Minute Fun In The SunTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Santa Clara Marriott Offers Special Summer Weekend Rates For Last-Minute Fun In The Sun Published on : Friday, August 14, 2015
Travelers planning a last-minute getaway before school starts can save some cool cash when booking a stay at Santa Clara Marriott.
Summer might be coming to an end, but the fun is just heating up. Featuring weekend specials with rates from just $139 a night, there’s never been a better time to make a splash at one of the premier hotels in Santa Clara, CA.
Soaking up the sun at the resort-style pool just got more appetizing with poolside dining. Cool off with a classic margarita or refreshing mojito, or kick back with a beer and some tasty nachos. When it’s time to truly indulge, taste buds will rejoice with favorites like the fresh Caesar salad, BLT turkey club, Chicago-style hot dog and tuna salad sandwich on the menu. Don’t forget about dessert, either. Haagen-Dazs ice cream bars and Twin Brothers ice cream cups will ensure diners stay cool by the pool.
Centrally located, the Santa Clara hotel is the perfect spot for spurring adventures off site. Guests can catch a game at Levi’s Stadium, home of the San Francisco 49ers, or take a tour of the facility, walking distance from the hotel. For the ultimate family adventure, travelers can walk across the street to discover plenty of thrills at California’s Great America Theme Park, featuring exciting rides, a water park and live entertainment. For free attractions in the area, the Intel Museum, Mission Santa Clara de Asis and Triton Museum of Art offer entertainment for all ages and interests.
Following a fun and sun-filled day, visitors can retreat to classic comforts at Santa Clara Marriott. Each guest room and suite offers the perfect amount of space for families wishing to spread out, along with beautiful balconies for guests to watch the sun set. When it’s time to wind down, guests can slip into luxurious bedding while enjoying their favorite show or movie on the flat-panel TV or taking advantage of high-speed Internet access.
Travelers nursing leftover energy from an exciting day can break a sweat in the state-of-the-art fitness center. Featuring a variety of free weights and cardiovascular equipment complete with personal TV screens, the gym will keep guests active and entertained 24/7 during their stay.
Source:- Santa Clara Marriott
